p:
To determine the DPPH‐RS activity, the CEO (50 μl) or control (50 50 μl) was mixed with 0.12 mM ethanolic DPPH solution (5 ml). The resulting solution was stored at 25°C for 30 min, and its absorbance ( A) was read at 517 nm. The DPPH‐RS activity was then measured as below:
DPPH ‐ RS activity
( % )
=
A control
‐
A CEO
A control
× 100 .
